main event: On August 11, 1951, many unidentified luminous objects were observed in Birmingham, Alabama.
interesting points: The objects left an orange-red trail and were estimated to be traveling at 800 mph., Their size ranged from 15 ft to 27 ft in diameter., The objects were described as circular in shape., The observation was noted during a meteor shower, which led to evaluations that they may be meteors., The sighting drew considerable interest from airport personnel.
witness description: Civilians attending the Birmingham Municipal Airport
